articles.author: Alexa Philippou
articles.title: WNBA's Fever name White as new head coach - ESPN
articles.description: Former Connecticut Sun coach Stephanie White has been hired as the new head coach of the Indiana Fever, the team announced.
articles.content:
The Indiana Fever have hired Stephanie White as their new head coach, the team announced Friday.
White, who spent the past two seasons as head coach of the Connecticut Sun, takes over a franchise le… [+2708 chars]
